dealBreakers: We do not want to receive contracts set aside for certifications we do not have, with places of performance outside our specified regions, with a design-build scope of work, over $5,000,000 in expected value, or requiring over five years of experience.
dealMakers: We would like to see federal and state-level contracts near Arlington, Virginia, preferring places of performance in VA, MD, DC, WV, PA, NJ, and NC. We would like at least 15 days to bid on a project and prefer renovation construction work for residential, institutional, and commercial buildings. We prefer less complex and smaller projects under $1,000,000 that require less past performance.
certifications: For Profit Organization Business or Organization Limited Liability Company
